Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe will greatly benefit you and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to hearing your response soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
